Posts.Content: Aug 30, 2018 11:34PM Xxkaylxx wrote: hey Hun, I’m sorry your going though this! I don’t no if this helps at all but I went to see my GP on the 22nd Aug as I had found a lump under my right breast. The GP referred me to the breast clinic at the hospital, I was seen Tuesday just gone. When I got there the breast surgeon examined me and sent me for a ultrasound scan I was then told I would need a core biopsy which they did there and then. I get my results on the 14th sept .
Posts.Title: Waiting on biopsy and breast screening. Susanna6539 Susanna6539
